statements: SELECT * FROM driver_performance_metrics WHERE driver_id = 1
SELECT trip_distance, average_speed FROM driver_performance_metrics WHERE trip_date = '2022-01-15'
SELECT driver_id, trip_distance, average_speed FROM driver_performance_metrics ORDER BY driver_id DESC
SELECT * FROM driver_performance_metrics WHERE trip_distance > 100 ORDER BY trip_distance ASC
SELECT AVG(average_speed) AS avg_speed FROM driver_performance_metrics
SELECT driver_id, trip_date, trip_distance, average_speed FROM driver_performance_metrics;
SELECT * FROM driver_performance_metrics WHERE trip_distance > 100 ORDER BY driver_id DESC;
SELECT driver_id, trip_date, average_speed FROM driver_performance_metrics WHERE trip_distance < 50 AND trip_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT trip_date, AVG(average_speed) AS avg_speed FROM driver_performance_metrics GROUP BY trip_date ORDER BY avg_speed DESC;
SELECT driver_id, trip_distance FROM driver_performance_metrics WHERE trip_date >= '2021-06-01' AND trip_distance BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY trip_date ASC, driver_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM driver_performance_metrics;
SELECT driver_id, average_speed FROM driver_performance_metrics;
SELECT total_distance_covered, average_speed FROM driver_performance_metrics;
SELECT * FROM coaching_feedback;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_message FROM coaching_feedback;
SELECT driver_id, average_speed FROM driver_performance_metrics WHERE total_distance_covered > 1000 ORDER BY average_speed DESC;
SELECT * FROM coaching_feedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT driver_id, average_speed, total_distance_covered FROM driver_performance_metrics WHERE average_speed > 60 AND total_distance_covered < 500 ORDER BY total_distance_covered ASC;
SELECT driver_id, feedback_message FROM driver_performance_metrics JOIN coaching_feedback ON driver_performance_metrics.driver_id = coaching_feedback.driver_id;
SELECT MAX(total_distance_covered) AS max_distance, MIN(total_distance_covered) AS min_distance FROM driver_performance_metrics;
SELECT * FROM drivers;
SELECT driver_name, total_distance FROM drivers WHERE total_distance > 1000;
SELECT driver_name, total_distance, total_time FROM drivers ORDER BY total_distance DESC;
SELECT driver_name, total_distance, average_speed FROM drivers WHERE average_speed > 50.0 ORDER BY average_speed;
SELECT driver_name, total_distance, total_time FROM drivers WHERE total_time < 500 ORDER BY total_distance ASC;
SELECT * FROM drivers;
SELECT driver_name, total_distance, total_time FROM drivers;
SELECT trip_id, start_location, end_location, distance_covered, time_taken FROM trips WHERE distance_covered > 100;
SELECT driver_name, total_distance FROM drivers ORDER BY total_distance DESC;
SELECT driver_name, total_distance, total_time FROM drivers WHERE average_speed > 30.0;
SELECT * FROM DriverPerformanceMetrics;
SELECT driver_id, date, total_distance FROM DriverPerformanceMetrics ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT driver_id, speed_limit_exceeded AS speed_exceeded, speeding_events AS speeding FROM DriverPerformanceMetrics WHERE speed_limit_exceeded > 0 OR speeding_events > 0;
SELECT driver_id, total_distance, speed_limit_exceeded, speeding_events FROM DriverPerformanceMetrics WHERE total_distance > 1000;
SELECT driver_id, AVG(speed_limit_exceeded) AS avg_speed_limit_exceeded FROM DriverPerformanceMetrics GROUP BY driver_id;
SELECT * FROM DriverPerformanceMetrics ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT driver_id, total_distance, speeding_events FROM DriverPerformanceMetrics WHERE total_distance > 1000 AND speed_limit_exceeded > 0;
SELECT d.driver_name, c.feedback_text FROM DriverDetails d JOIN CoachingFeedback c ON d.driver_id = c.driver_id WHERE c.feedback_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT s.coach_id, COUNT(*) AS total_sessions FROM CoachingSessions s GROUP BY s.coach_id ORDER BY total_sessions DESC;
SELECT d.driver_name, d.email_address, c.session_date FROM DriverDetails d JOIN CoachingSessions c ON d.driver_id = c.driver_id WHERE c.session_duration > 60 ORDER BY c.session_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM drivers ORDER BY driver_name ASC;
SELECT driver_name, driver_phone FROM drivers WHERE driver_id = '1234';
SELECT * FROM trips WHERE trip_distance > 100 ORDER BY trip_date DESC;
SELECT driver_name, driver_email FROM drivers WHERE driver_license LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM violations WHERE violation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-05-31';
SELECT * FROM drivers WHERE driver_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT driver_id, driver_email FROM drivers WHERE driver_phone LIKE '%123%';
SELECT driver_name, driver_email, driver_license FROM drivers ORDER BY driver_email DESC;

SELECT d.driver_name, t.trip_date, v.violation_type FROM drivers d JOIN trips t ON d.driver_id = t.driver_id JOIN violations v ON t.trip_id = v.trip_id WHERE t.trip_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';

SELECT d.driver_name, c.session_date, c.session_topic, f.feedback_message FROM drivers d JOIN coaching_sessions c ON d.driver_id = c.driver_id LEFT JOIN feedback f ON d.driver_id = f.driver_id WHERE f.feedback_message IS NOT NULL ORDER BY c.session_date ASC;
